Consultant ‚Äî PricewaterhouseCoopers
Aug 2021 - Aug 2024

Led technical requirement gathering and oversaw the design and implementation of a Medicare Stars data mart and cube
Facilitated data mapping through SQL queries, and contributed to the design of the relational database schema composed of fourteen datasets for the data mart
Managed a team of 10 developers, providing guidance on technical and business requirements, offering subject matter expertise, and conducting unit testing to ensure high-quality deliverables
Developed a technology strategy for a major healthcare payer, assessing technology across claims, billing, enrollment, and provider domains; defined optimal architecture to support business objectives
Advised a large pharmaceutical benefit manager on implementing program governance models, enhancing operational efficiencies crucial for securing capital funding
Coordinated the transition of an in-flight program to an agile delivery model by managing three program managers across four workstreams to help technology and product teams execute on the roadmap

Graduate Teaching Assistant ‚Äî Georgetown University
May 2025 - Aug 2025

Assisted incoming graduate students in mastering Python and R programming fundamentals through instruction, feedback, and one-on-one support in a required summer course






Programming: Python, R, SQL, MongoDB, MATLAB, HTML, CSS, Selenium
Data Analysis and Visualization: NumPy, Pandas, SciPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly, NetworkX, Altair
Machine learning frameworks: PyTorch, Keras, TensorFlow, scikit-learn
Miscellaneous: Git, Github, Quarto, bash, Docker

title: About Me
text: Adam Stein is a recent Master‚Äôs student in Data Science & Analytics at Georgetown University with a Bachelor of Science in Chemical Engineering from Washington University in St.¬†Louis. He brings three years of professional experience as a consultant (PwC), leveraging analytical and problem-solving skills to drive impactful solutions. His academic and professional interests include machine learning, large language models (LLMs), and artificial intelligence, where he is passionate about exploring innovative applications and driving technological advancements.

title: Projects
text:
Here are some of my data science and machine learning projects. Click on the links to see the GitHub repos.


Tech: Python, Unsupervised Learning, Supervised Learning
Description: Applied unsupervised clustering to group songs based on acoustic attributes (tempo, energy, danceability), uncovering latent structure across genres
üîó Live Site: View Project
üíª Code: GitHub Repo




Tech: R, Hypothesis Testing
Description: Built a system that recommends off-the-beaten-path travel destinations using hybrid retrieval techniques.
Repo: GitHub Link




Tech: Python, Unsupervised Learning, Supervised Learning
Description: Engineered predictive features to classify districts into high, medium, and low chronic absenteeism risk levels
Repo: GitHub Link




Tech: Python, PyTorch, Transformers, Yolov8
Description: Built a model to classify collision vs.¬†non-collision events from dashcam videos using spatial and temporal features
Repo: GitHub Link




Tech: Python, NetworkX
Description: Performed network analysis of director/actor collaborations
Repo: GitHub Link




Tech: Python, FAISS, ModernBERT, BM25
Description: Built a system that recommends off-the-beaten-path travel destinations using hybrid retrieval techniques.
Repo: GitHub Link




Tech: Python, NLP, Transformers
Description: Analyzed patterns, topics, and virality in conspiracy subreddits using NLP and machine learning.
Repo: GitHub Link
